headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid ALGN and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Align Technology has gotten torched over the last six months - since September 2024, its stock price has dropped 35.3% to $164.50 per share. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
